details.overview: The PERKASA application is designed to help HRDs and employees manage various aspects of human resources more efficiently and transparently. With key features such as attendance, requests, payroll, announcements, and manage employees, the app allows HRDs to monitor attendance, manage leave requests and salary increases, automatically calculate salaries, and deliver important announcements. Employees can also access personal information, submit requests, and view announcements easily, thereby increasing workplace satisfaction and productivity.
details.problem:
In the era of growing information technology, human resource information systems (HRIS) are important for companies to manage employees more effectively. HRIS helps HRD in managing employee data, attendance, performance appraisals, and payroll. According to Fahmi and Sari (2018), the implementation of HRIS can improve the efficiency of HRD performance.
A PwC study (2020) shows that 77% of companies worldwide have used digital technology, including HRIS, in their HR management, and these companies tend to have better financial performance. However, there are still many small companies and MSMEs in Indonesia that have not used this application, making the HR management process less efficient and transparent.
details.solution: To overcome the problems in human resource management (HRM), we propose a solution in the form of an effective and efficient HRM application. This application is designed to assist HRD and employees with key features such as attendance, payroll, and employee needs/permit requests. Through this application, we hope to improve efficiency, accuracy, and transparency in managing employee data and company finances, as well as increase employee satisfaction and motivation.

details.overview: Synauw is a mobile application designed to help users learn digital skills such as design and coding through structured and engaging online courses. The app presents directed and interactive material, so users can learn more effectively and not feel bored. With features such as quizzes, hands-on projects, and learning communities, Synauw ensures a learning experience that supports all-round digital skills development.
details.problem: The main problem behind the creation of the Synauw app is the increasing need for digital skills in this modern era. Although many online tutorials are available, many people feel directionless in their learning process and find learning to be tedious. Synauw is here to provide a clear structure and a more engaging learning experience, making it easier for users to learn digital skills such as design and coding.
details.solution: Synauw offers a solution by delivering structured and engaging online courses to learn digital skills. With a more targeted approach, Synauw helps users learn effectively without getting bored. Users can choose courses according to their interests, such as design or coding, and follow materials designed to improve their skills gradually. In addition, interactive features such as quizzes, hands-on projects, and learning communities help keep users motivated and provide support throughout the learning process.

details.overview: Narasee is an AI-based app that makes it easy to create professional presentation videos without the need for recording or editing skills. Users simply upload a photo of themselves, a voice recording, and a video script, and Narasee automatically combines the elements into a compelling, ready-to-use video. With additional features such as background options, the app allows anyone to create personalized and memorable video presentations with ease.
details.problem: In this digital age, presentation videos have become an effective way to introduce yourself or convey a message. However, not everyone has the skills or equipment to create a professional video. To overcome this, Narasee comes as an application that utilizes AI to help users create self-presentation videos easily. Users only need to upload photos, voice recordings, and the script they want to deliver. The app will automatically combine these elements into an attractive and professional presentation video, without the need for complicated recording or editing skills.
details.solution: Narasee hadir sebagai solusi bagi individu yang ingin membuat video presentasi profesional tanpa perlu keahlian dalam perekaman atau pengeditan video. Dengan memanfaatkan teknologi AI, Narasee menggabungkan foto diri, rekaman suara, dan skrip video secara otomatis, sehingga proses pembuatan video menjadi cepat dan mudah. Aplikasi ini memungkinkan siapa saja, bahkan mereka yang tidak memiliki peralatan atau kemampuan editing, untuk menyampaikan pesan dengan cara yang menarik dan profesional.
